title: 111_s1981
content: Liquidation or reliquidation of certain line items in entries of tailored garments from Costa Rica is mandated by U.S. Customs and Border Protection within 180 days of the enactment of this Act. This includes liquidating or reliquidating at a zero percent rate and refunding excess duties previously collected on specified line items. The affected entry summary line items are listed in subsection (b). Entry Number 336 6995690-9 includes line items 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, and 7 with a date of entry on 01/21/2009. Entry Number 336 6995752-7 includes line items 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, and 8 with the same entry date. Entry Number 336 6857236-8 includes line items 2 and 4 with a date of entry on 02/05/2009. 336 6995915-0 includes line items 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, and 10 with an entry date of 02/18/2009. 336 6996645-2 includes line items 1, 2, and 3 with an entry date of 03/11/2009. 336 6996703-9 includes line items 1, 2, 3, 9, 10, and 11 with an entry date of 03/13/2009. 336 6997034-8 includes line items 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, and 7 with an entry date of 03/25/2009. 336 6997136-1 includes line items 2, 3, 5, 6, and 8 with an entry date of 04/09/2009. 336 6997136-1 includes line items 2, 3, 5, 6, and 8 with an entry date of 04/09/2009. 336 6280217-5 includes line items 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 7, and 8 with an entry date of 05/20/2009. 336 6280254-8 includes line item 1 with an entry date of 05/16/2009. 336 6280767-9 includes line items 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 7, 8, 12, and 16 with an entry date of 06/11/2009. 336 6280845-3 includes line items 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 9, and 10 with an entry date of 06/17/2009. 336 6281209-1 includes line items 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5 with an entry date of 06/30/2009. 336 6281209-1 includes line items 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5 with an entry date of 06/30/2009. 336 6281379-2 includes line items 2, 3, 4, 10, 13, 14, and 15 with an entry date of 07/08/2009. 336 6281524-3 includes line items 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 11, and 12 with an entry date of 07/10/2009. 336 6282427-8 includes line items 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 10, and 11 with an entry date of 08/19/2009. 336 6282428-6 includes line items 1, 2, 5, 6, 10, and 11 with an entry date of 08/19/2009. 336 6282672-9 includes line item 1 with an entry date of 08/31/2009. 336 6283041-6 includes line items 1 and 2 with an entry date of 09/05/2009. 336 6283235-4 includes line items 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, and 9 with an entry date of 09/16/2009. 336 6283234-7 includes line items 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, 10, 12, 13, and 14 with an entry date of 09/16/2009. Line items 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, 10, 12, 13, and 14 were included in entry 336 6283234-7 on 09/16/2009.
